1392940.name: Day of the Worms
1392940.description:
It's a busy summer day on an allotment site in northern England. The fruit trees are laden with ripe apples and cherries, the carrots are ready to be picked, and then, there's the maintenance to crack on with. Nobody wants a dirty plot notice.

What starts as a day of part-time agricultural endeavour, quickly turns to terror in this hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure with interactive fiction elements. Common worms have mutated into carnivorous killers, bent on transforming Britain into a land of zombies. Even worse, you can't find your digestive biscuits!

Rake leaves, burn weeds, pick fruit, and fight for your life.
